data.title: List of World War I flying aces from the British Empire
data.meta_description: The following aviators from the British Empire were credited with five or more aerial victories during World War I. This list is complete. See also List of World War I aces credited with 20 or more victories Billy Bishop Edward Mannock Raymond Collishaw James McCudden Andrew Beauchamp-Proctor...
data.text:
The following aviators from the British Empire were credited with five or more aerial victories during World War I. This list is complete.

See also List of World War I aces credited with 20 or more victories
